title: Shinyuu to H shitemimashita
original_name: 親友と H してみました
sinopse:
Takahiro confessed to Kei and now they're going out (even if it's one-sided), but sex is strictly forbidden since their first attempt was too painful for Kei. Takahiro wants to try again and would do anything to change Kei's mind, even win a marathon.

(Source: MU)
